title: Germany's government is on the brink of collapse — here’s what could happen now
content: Germany's ruling coalition has long been standing on shaky ground, but the situation has become critical in recent weeks, with a breakup more likely than ever.
summary: Germany's ruling coalition has long been standing on shaky ground, but the situation has become critical in recent weeks, with a breakup more likely than ever.

title: What the stock market typically does after the U.S. election, according to history
content: Stocks typically rise after a presidential election, but investors need to be prepared for some short-term choppiness first, history shows.
summary: Stocks typically rise after a presidential election, but investors need to be prepared for some short-term choppiness first, history shows.

title: The Dow needs Nvidia to give chipmakers representation in index after Intel's plunge
content: Intel has fallen so far so fast that the chipmaker's stock price is no longer having an impact on the Dow Jones Industrial Average.
summary: Intel has fallen so far so fast that the chipmaker's stock price is no longer having an impact on the Dow Jones Industrial Average.

title: Labor strikes shut down operations at Canada's container ports from East to West Coast, with U.S. trade left in limbo
content: Ports of Vancouver and Prince Rupert are at a standstill after ILWU union workers walked off the job, the latest in a string of Canadian labor strikes.
summary: Ports of Vancouver and Prince Rupert are at a standstill after ILWU union workers walked off the job, the latest in a string of Canadian labor strikes.

title: Quantifying how much Nvidia will influence the Dow after it joins the storied average
content: Nvidia will join the price-weighted Dow on Friday.

title: Jeff Bezos and OpenAI invest in robot startup Physical Intelligence at $2.4 billion valuation
content: Amazon's Jeff Bezos and OpenAI invested in Physical Intelligence, a robot startup that raised $400 million at a $2.4 billion post-money valuation.

title: Singapore Airlines will add first class, revamp cabins for longest flights

title: Foreign buyers eye Japan's empty houses with millions available for cheap — but experts warn of risks
content: While many places in the world face a housing shortage, Japan is facing the opposite problem: An oversupply of homes on the market.
summary: While many places in the world face a housing shortage, Japan is facing the opposite problem: An oversupply of homes on the market.

title: Move over Black Friday: Consumer interest in 'Travel Tuesday' soars
content: Search interest for "Travel Tuesday" rose more than 500% over the last two years, according to a report published Thursday by McKinsey & Company.
summary: Search interest for "Travel Tuesday" rose more than 500% over the last two years, according to a report published Thursday by McKinsey & Company.

title: Berkshire Hathaway's cash fortress tops $300 billion as Buffett sells more stock, freezes buybacks

title: SK Hynix rallies 6.5% after Nvidia boss Jensen Huang asks firm to expedite next-generation chip

title: Talen, Constellation and Vistra tumble after government rejects Amazon nuclear data center agreement
content: Talen Energy in March sold the data center campus to Amazon for $650 million, which would be powered by the nuclear plant in a first-of-its-kind deal.

title: Next U.S. president shouldn't surrender America's energy dominance, TotalEnergies CEO warns

title: The year's top tech stock is up 300% thanks to AI — but it's not Nvidia

title: Shock poll shows Harris leading Trump in Iowa
